game.name: Cyberhunt
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 게임 사이버헌트 CYBERHUNT 는 일종 트윈 스틱 슈터로서 달콤한 아케이드 기계 시대로 되돌려줍니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cyberhunt is a retro procedurally generated twin stick shooter, that takes you back to the sweet to the sweet arcade machines era!
